title: Star Short Seller Carson Block on 2021's Wild Ride in Markets
description: Muddy Waters Capital founder Carson Block talks with Financial News acting editor Trista Kelley about the rise of GameStop and Tesla, shorting China and the boom in SPACs.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Muddy Waters Capital founder Carson Block talks with Financial News acting editor Trista Kelley about the rise of GameStop and Tesla, shorting China and the boom in SPACs.
